name: Create a sales receipt in QuickBooks from customer details in a Google Sheets spreadsheet.
description: Every time a customer's details are added to a Google Sheet, Make retrieves the info and creates a sales receipt in QuickBooks. If its a new customer, the customer is first added to QuickBooks and then a receipt is created. The template uses this [example spreadsheet.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Ie8njl21Ob0cyugwb4qg_HIX53qsJAeph2vrLxvq9ww/edit#gid=0/xxx)
